ygData.subject: Re: Spectre Tactics
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok I ve been hunting spectres since level 46 (now 49), here s a few tips that will save you the hassel of constantly zoning. There is one spectre outside the
ygData.messageBody:
Ok I've been hunting spectres since level 46 (now 49), here's a few tips
that will save you the hassel of constantly zoning.

There is one spectre outside the cave that spawns, he's near the tree
just out from the cave. Always always kill him, if he's camped already,
good, that's one less spectre to worry about. Secondly, there is a
patroller that goes to the entrance of the cave, make sure he doesn't
pop up if you try to kill the stationary spectre just inside the cave.
If you're 47 and higher, usually you will only pull one spectre if you
stay at the entrance of the cave. I found this to be the best for
experience at level 46.

Anyhow, always make sure, before you cast, that there are no other
spectres in the area. I can safely assume you tried to pull a spectre
just at the inside of the cave, while the patroller was near, which
brought the inner stationary spectre and the spectre outside for a four
on one. =)

Lots of information, hope it helps.

Cheers

> Message: 1
> Date: Tue, 26 Oct 1999 07:34:42 -0400
> From: "Heather M. Daley" <blushn@...>
> Subject: Re: Spectres in Feerrott
>
> I am not sure about what level to solo them at, ( i forget Quite frankly) I
> did a lot of soloing there myself, but they(verant) changed a few things
> there which prevented me from soloing them anymore.
> They made the Spectres "cry for help" range larger, they also changed
> their pathing. Many spectres would get stuck on walls trying to come out of
> the Cave, Verant made it so if they get stuck they teleport to your /loc. I
> stopped soloing the Spectres the day that I pulled one, was fighting a great
> battle, then magically I had Three land on my head.
> Perhaps you can solo the one outside without stirring the rest of them up,
> Sorry I didn't really answer your questin, i don't remember what level. I
> just thought I would make this info known incase you were not aware.
>
> Bree Wyndsdale
> 49th Cleric of Fennin Ro
>

> I would recommend 39, but it's doable at 34. Just be prepared to zone a lot
> without getting any exp for your trouble, training that thing all the way back
> to the Rathe Mountain zone point, etc. Great exp, but at your level there will
> be a few that spawn that you won't be able to take down.
>
> Ailamil Faithbringer
